Topic.Title: Has Amzn ever Made a Profit?

Message.Msg: "I have heard that Amzn has never made a profit. Is this true. If it is, why are so many people buying the snake oil?" 'People' arent buying snake oil, robots are though az they are stuffed with other peoplez bernanke bux that lack moral hazard. They are doing this to wipe put the bandwaggon of shorts and kill the creak head optionz buyerz against bot priced premiumz. This will continue az long az bernanke continuez to manufacture bernanke bux with endless easing. By doing so, bernanke freez up 'bank' (prop trading desk) capital to drive up bit coin and grow big beautiful tulips. 'Banks' have decided that farming tulip bulbz while underwriting risky bond debt at rediculously low interest rates to guyz like bezos and hastingz iz a better business than spending it in a real economy, because the real economy iz actually very leveraged and very weak and will be so 'for an extended period of time'. Hopefully this answerz your question. Please note that this doez not mean that amzn or any other flying pig will tank 'today' or 'tomorrow', so 'timing' such a bet with crack head put optionz or 3x margin leverage shorts will make you insolvant long before your bet iz found to be correct. The markets will tank and the flying pigz will eventually rain down from the sky with enormous SPLATS to the ground, but only when the bandwaggon of shorts haz been murdered and NOBODY iz looking or positioned for a crash.

Message.Msg: This clown was calling for crashes going back to August 2012 and before on the AMZN board. Meanwhile the stock went from $200 to $323 so far, and the S&P went from 1300 to over 1730 now. Even after changing is "ID" about 10 times here since then, this clown can't get away from how much of complete joke every call he's made has been. He's bound to get one right. Maybe the market meltup is the one. He's still a clown who i abused and used all of 2012 and into 2013 with his fake short bravado. lol! There's plenty of these conversations all though 2012 from July 2012 when the market really took off. Sybil was staring at the multi year amzn chart while in commune with the trading gods This pig looks very very tired after running and squeeling a long way for a long time.... The trading gods said "be patient, sybil it will crash. Continue to short the 'rallies'". So that is what sybil must do.
